name: Space Sabotage (Skorpia)
description:
In Space Sabotage you play as the galaxy-known space pirate named Steve Franklin.

Your mission is to infiltrate a Flagship of the Galactic Empire and to destroy it from the inside by manipulating the Flagships Fusion Reactor to a nuclear meltdown.

                           Fusion Reactor

 This is infact easier said than done; on your way to the Flagships Core, you will encounter a few safety measures to prevent intruders like you to infiltrate the area. For example, you will have to get by cameras unseen or they will lock you up!  

High-Tech Roboters will patrol every corner of the Spaceship to neutralize every threat they encounter and the auto-turrets will shoot down anything on sight! On your way through the Spaceship, you'll have to collect several C4-Fragments to build yourself a functioning C4 which you can use to demolish your way through the spacecraft. 

 

Good luck out there!
